text: Futhi nakulabo abangamaJuda sabanqabela zonke izilwane ezinezinzipho nezinkomo namagusha sabanqabela emafutheni ako kokubili ngaphandle kwalokho okusemhlane wazo zombili noma okusemathunjini noma lokho okuhlangene nethambo kanjalo-ke sabanika umvuzo (isijeziso) ngokubayizoni kwabo futhi ngempela thina singabaneqiniso
